thread.title: Wammy Titan 5 launched with 3GB RAM, full HD 5.5-inch display and Fingerprint sensor | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Wammy Titan 5 launched with 3GB RAM, full HD 5.5-inch display and Fingerprint sensor | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Wammy Titan 5 launched with 3GB RAM, full HD 5.5-inch display and Fingerprint sensor | Deccan Chronicle
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 17, 2015, 09.46 Wickedleak, the Mumbai based smartphone and tablet manufacturer has introduced Wammy Titan 5 Smartphone in the Indian market. Priced at Rs 14,990 It is powered by MediaTek’s MT6753 64 bit octa-core processor, coupled with Mali T720 GPU and supports 4G. Wammy Titan 5 runs on MediaTek’s 64 bit octa-core Processor coupled with 3GB LPDDR3 RAM which can deliver performance with lower power consumption. Moreover, the phone is equipped with Mali T720 GPU which can handle high-end games users with ease. It comes with a full HD display having a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels with a pixel density of 401ppi and protected by Gorilla Glass 3. Wammy Titan 5’s touch screen also supports Glove touch and Wet Touch and can be controlled in the trickiest situations. Wammy Titan 5 comes with Dual Micro SIM (FDD-LTE) 4G support. Key features include Advanced Fingerprint scanner with 360-degree touch for added security and a 10ms response time. The smartphone packs in a 4165mAh Li-Polymer battery with support for fast charging mode. Wammy Titan 5 has an ergonomically curved back panel to enhance the grip of the hand with a matte textured finish. It measures 8.0mm in thickness and has a screen to body ratio of 76%. The Titan 5 features a 13MP rear camera with Samsung 3L2, 5MP Front wide angle camera and 16GB of internal storage which can be expanded up to 128GB via external micro SD card. As part of a value offer, Wickedleak will be offering free screen breakage insurance to the customers. The price of the Wammy Titan 5 is Rs 14,990, but Wickedleak has entered into Strategic Agreements with Various companies offering services on Android Apps making the effective price a steal. The handset comes along with a couple of offers that can help you avail Rs 8,000 in benefits and cash discounts. Here are the exclusive cash back deals up to Rs 8,000 which you as a user of Wammy Titan will get: Uber : Rs 300 off Holachef : Rs 450 Off Hotels Around You : Rs 2,000 off on Hotels Booking across India. GrabonRent : Rs 500 off on Furniture Rentals. OLA Cabs : Rs 250 off. Gapoon : Rs 4,500 Off. Wickedleak Titan 5 customers will also get exclusive deals and cash back offers on a time-to-time basis as part of their community. They are currently in talks with various app companies which provide similar offers. Complete Specifications: Model : Wammy Titan 5 Dimensions : 155.2mmx76.6mmx9.2mm Weight : 197 grams CPU : MT6753 True octacore 64-bit SoC GPU : ARM MALI-T720 RAM : 3GB DDR3 Storage : 16GB Display : 5.5-inch 1920x1080 IPS OGS Battery : 4165mAh OS : Android 5.1 Camera : Rear 13MP Samsung 3L2, front 5MP SIM : Dual SIM, dual standby (4G FDD-LTE Support) Wi - Fi : 802.11b/g/n USB : Micro Bluetooth : 4.0 Positioning : GPS, A-GPS FM Radio : Yes Network support : FDD-LTE: band 3/7/20 (800/1800/2600) WCDMA: band 1/8(900/2100) GSM: band 3/5/8 (850/900/1800) technology latest Mobiles and tabs Wickedleak Also Read Solar Impulse to be stuck for a week in Japan for repairs Apple users need to watch out for a new malware Mumbai generous in tips, Delhi poor Bendgate hits Apple iPad Air 2
